mcq.statement: Which of the following personalities attended all three Round Table Conferences?

options.a: Sir Zafrulla Khan, Ambedkar, and Tej Bahadur
options.c: Sir Zafrulla Khan, Gandhi, and Nehru

mcq.one_liner: Among the notable personalities, **Sir Zafrulla Khan**, Ambedkar, and Tej Bahadur attended all three Round Table Conferences.
